sources.snippet: The Centro neighborhood of Madrid is the oldest, most historic part of the city. sources.title: Centro (Madrid) - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: The district currently houses the central government of the Community of Madrid, in Puerta del Sol. Until 2007, the City Council of Madrid was also located here, in Plaza de la Villa. At present it is located in Cybele Palace, in the district of Retiro. | Centro ([ˈθentɾo], "Centre") is a district of Madrid, Spain. It is approximately 5.23 km2 (2.02 sq mi) in size.
